thread.title: Small Businesses: Key to the American Dream

author: wsjcom
title: Small Businesses: Key to the American Dream
text:
Regarding “Stop Propping Up Small Business” (Review, April 7), the authors say that “discriminatory policies provide an incentive for small firms to remain small. Why add five more workers when doing so would subject you to a host of new regulations and restrict your access to government handouts?” It seems to me they should be lobbying to have the regulatory burdens reduced, so that small businesses would have an incentive to become big businesses.
Scott G. Davis
